titleStmt.title: Charles R. Wee are so highly sensible of the extraordinary merit of Our county of Cornwall, of their zeale for the defence of Our person, and the just rights of Our crowne ...
Proclamations. 1643-09-10
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: y Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from opening lines of text.
Dated at end: Given at our campe at Sudeley Castle the tenth of September. 1643.
Arms 37; Steele notation: of gable at.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
